commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It's done! My new song is complete!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That was a struggle. I can't believe it took us this long. The live show is tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, we made it on time, so it's all good. I'm glad we focused on the details, though, because this song is awesome. I couldn't be happier with it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We worked on it till the last minute, but it was worth it!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I really poured my heart into this song. Do you think people will like it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course they will. I guarantee it.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Then I guess I can rest easy. For some reason, I always have complete trust in your opinions.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? Am I that persuasive?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Sure you are. You're always there for me, and I appreciate that so, soooo much!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Second only to Haruka, right?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Laugh* When it comes to school idols, your words count the most!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, stop, you're making me blush.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It's true! Haruka is a big factor, but you're the main reason I get to be a little selfish and pursue being a school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You mean it? That's really nice of you. I can't wait until tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah! I'm gonna get so much energy from the crowd tomorrow, and I'll give back a million times more.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I've got to put as much feeling as I can into singing this song to thank everyone for their support.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You really like being a school idol, don't you?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I love it! It's only because I have my life as a school idol that I've got the drive to work hard at other things, too. When people cheer for me, it gives me power.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, the more they cheer you on, the bigger the power-up?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Uh-huh! That's why when I'm onstage, I'm invincible!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You always look so glamorous on stage.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll be shining even brighter tomorrow since I'll be singing the song we wrote together. I'm going to be an even greedier school idol than before.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: And one day, I'm gonna sing lots of songs at an even bigger venue than that last solo event!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* You're pretty ambitious.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It's more motivating to have a lofty goal than a dream that'll easily come true, right? Or am I aiming a little too high?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, I don't think so. I believe you'll achieve your goal, and fast! It'll be my pleasure to help you get there.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aww, thanks. That's good because I need a bit of your support right now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: With what?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, I'm about to sing a full rehearsal set for the show, so I need you to cheer for me!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Use that voice of yours to gimme a big, big, power up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You can count on me! I'll cheer at the top of my lungs!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Today, I'm singing just for you. I want you to feel everything I've got, too!
